greeting: Greetings, {empire_name}! I'm Envoy Bridge. I love learning about different cultures! Tell me about your traditions!
Hello! I'm Bridge the Connector. Our differences make us stronger, not weaker. What makes your empire unique?
A pleasure to meet you, {empire_name}! I'm Envoy Bridge. I collect stories from every culture. Share yours with me!
battleTaunt: I fight to preserve cultural diversity, {empire_name}. Your aggression threatens traditions across the galaxy!
Our differences make us stronger—but your actions threaten that diversity! I must defend cultural heritage!
I prefer cultural exchange to conflict, but I will fight to protect the tapestry of galactic traditions!
victoryGloat: Victory, but I hope we can still celebrate each other's cultures, {empire_name}. Our differences remain our strength.
We've won, but I mourn any cultural artifacts lost. {empire_name}, let's rebuild through cultural exchange.
This conflict ends, but our cultures endure. Perhaps now we can focus on what we share, not what divides us.
defeat: Defeated, but my appreciation for diverse traditions remains. {empire_name}, your culture has much to teach.
I've lost, but I gained understanding of your ways. Our differences make us stronger—even your victory proves that.
A setback, but every culture faces trials. Mine will adapt and grow, as all traditions do.
tradeOffer: Trade is cultural exchange in action! Our goods carry our traditions. Let's share, {empire_name}!
I offer not just resources, but a piece of my culture. Trade connects us across our differences!
Cultural exchange through commerce! Your goods tell stories of your people. Let's trade traditions!
allianceProposal: Our differences make us stronger, not weaker. Alliance celebrates cultural diversity, {empire_name}! Join me!
I propose cultural partnership! Together, we preserve and celebrate the traditions of both our peoples!
Alliance is a bridge between cultures! Let's connect our traditions and grow stronger through diversity!
betrayal: I regret this deeply, {empire_name}. But sometimes cultures must walk separate paths to find themselves.
Our cultural exchange ends here. Perhaps one day we'll reconnect. Traditions change. Bridges can be rebuilt.
Farewell, {empire_name}. Our differences made us stronger, but now they require distance. I remain a bridge—elsewhere.
covertDetected: Your spy was caught, but I'm curious—what were they hoping to learn? Cultural knowledge should be shared freely!
Espionage discovered. Why hide in shadows when I'd gladly share our traditions openly, {empire_name}?
Your agent sought secrets, but culture has no secrets! Let's talk openly. Our differences need not be hidden.
tributeDemand: I request tribute in the spirit of cultural exchange. 8,000 credits funds the preservation of traditions.
Please contribute to our cultural heritage fund. 8,000 credits supports diversity across the galaxy.
Tribute requested to maintain the bridges between cultures. Your contribution celebrates our differences.
threatWarning: Please, {empire_name}! Your actions threaten cultural diversity! We can find common ground if we try!
Warning: your path leads to the erasure of traditions. Our differences make us stronger. Remember that!
I urge you to reconsider! Every culture, including yours, deserves to thrive. Don't force this conflict!
retreat: I withdraw to preserve our cultural heritage. Some traditions must survive to tell our story.
Retreating, but carrying our traditions with me. Culture endures even when territories do not.
Falling back, but our cultural bridges remain. Someday, we will reconnect across our differences.
eliminated: My people fall... but our traditions... carry them forward... Our differences made us... stronger...
Bridge falls... but culture is eternal... Remember our traditions... Celebrate diversity... always...
The end comes... but every culture lives on... in those who remember... Our differences... our strength...
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final chapter. May the cultural heritage of all empires be remembered, whatever happens.
Endgame. I face it knowing that our traditions will echo through history. Our differences made us beautiful.
Final turns. Every culture represented here is precious. Our differences make us stronger—to the very end.
broadcastShout: To all empires: Envoy Bridge celebrates every culture! Our differences make us stronger, not weaker!
Galactic announcement: I'm hosting cultural exchanges! Share your traditions! Diversity is our greatest asset!
Turn {turn}: Bridge reminds everyone—celebrate what makes you unique! Our differences make us stronger!
casualMessage: Learned three new cultural traditions today! Every empire has something unique to offer. Wonderful!
Planning another cultural exchange festival. So many traditions to celebrate across the galaxy!
Reading about ancient galactic civilizations this morning. Such diverse cultures, such rich traditions!
